body.name: Retro Gaming Console, Nostalgia Stick Game, Retro Video Game Console with Built-in 9 Emulators, 20,000+ Games, 4K HDMI Output, and 2.4GHz Wireless Controller for TV Plug and Play (64 G)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
features: 【Huge Games Library】Experience the nostalgia of your favorite retro games with the Retro Game Stick. With over 20,000 games built-in and 9 pre-installed emulators, along with a 64GB TF card, you can enjoy a vast collection of classic games without the need to download or install anything. Simply connect it to your TV and immerse yourself in endless gaming fun.

【4K HDMI Output】The retro video game console supports 4K high definition HDMI output, giving you ultra-clear picture quality and allowing you to capture every detail of your favorite games. With compatibility for a variety of devices such as TVs, computers, monitors, and projectors, just ensure your screen has an HDMI input port and connect for a realistic and comfortable gaming experience.

【Support 2 Players 】Our nostalgia stick comes with two 2.4GHz wireless controllers that provide stable and almost delay-free connections. Play games simultaneously and enjoy a cable-free gaming experience with a maximum connection distance of 32.8 feet. The controllers require 4 AAA batteries (Not included in package).

【Easy Operation】The retro gaming console offers easy operation with features such as saving game progress and a built-in favorites/search/history function. Simply connect the game stick to the power supply, plug it into your TV or monitor, and switch to the HD channel. No complicated setup or installation required, making it convenient and suitable for gamers of all ages.

【Ideal Gift for All Ages】The nostalgia stick game console provides hours of fun for kids and evokes fond memories of childhood for adults. It's a perfect gift for any occasion, bringing joy to children and releasing life pressure for adults. Lightweight and convenient for travel and home use, it's an ideal gift for birthdays or any occasion to enjoy happy game time with family and friends.
body.description: Make sure the game stick's indicator light is on when it's acting up. A few reasons you might be having trouble getting connected: 1. Dust or a wonky fit might be mucking up the HDMI port on your display. Try giving it a clean before another go. 2. The memory card might not be seated right due to jostling during transit. Pull it out, pop it back in, then power up the device. 3. If the indicator light on the device isn't coming on, it could be because it's getting too much power, which might lead to burnout.

productInformation.value: 3.0 3.0 out of 5 stars 11 ratings 3.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There are so many games in this small device also its so easy to connect with your tv…almost all childhood games were available there..Also impressed by the quality of controllers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The remotes are cheap feeling thin plastic. And when I got it hooked up to the TV it would only let me scroll through about 20 games before it either blanked out or locked up. Glitched and then wouldn’t do anything else. Will definitely return this piece of junk. Typical flashy hype that doesn’t work.

reviews.reviewerName: Brings back good old memoryBrings back good old memory
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely loved it
reviews.reviewText: Give this as a present to my dad who used to a huge gamer for Christmas gift. Now I can’t remember him going to fishing anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hunk of junk
reviews.reviewText: Worked twice and that was it. All I get is a black screen. I tried plugging it in and then unplugging it. I took the sd card out and then put it back in. Nothing. I don’t expect much for $50 but I do expect it to work. Avoid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Controlers are cheap.
reviews.reviewText: Great product but controlers break very easily and I see no replacements available that'll conect to the console. Smh. I tried to make a return but it's not allowing me to do so.Don't buy this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Always wanted a small portable console to play some retro games! What I didn’t know was it comes with an extra HDMI extender which shows extra support from these guys! My monitor has a smaller hdmi port and I couldn’t fit the game stick on there. Nevertheless, I found one extra extender to finish the set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got product it didn't work contacted owner nothing was done and I bought the warranty d pad button on controller cheap don't work either won't buy ever again lesson learned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Justo lo que esperaba
reviews.reviewText: Fácil de manejar y tiene un montón de juegos von los que te puedes entretener, de 9 consolas distintas. Me encanto lo recomiendo
